# List of awards and nominations received by Richard E. Grant

{| class="infobox" style="width: 25em; text-align: left; font-size: 70%; vertical-align: middle;"
|+ List of Richard E. Grant awards
|-
| colspan="3" style="text-align:center;" |
|- bgcolor=#D9E8FF style="text-align:center;"

| style="background:#cceecc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Wins
| style="background:#eecccc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Nominations
|- bgcolor=#eeeeff
| align="center"|
;Academy Awards

This is a list of awards and nominations received by Swazi-English actor Richard E. Grant.
